title: Ghost Nocturne Tail
body:
Been told to write it here so... 

{{champion:56}} **spooki**

Is ghost nocturne's tail a graphic error? because in my opinion it looks so pix elated and outdated even with the skin reworks and also the tail is attached to the ground which I hate an absolute ton which is the reason I don't play him anymore I used to love the skin till the rework, now it seems very poor done and terrible can you please fix it if it is a graphic error?
also if you think that the skin doesn't need it since its not purchasable at the moment then think again since the harrowing is in 4 days which will release all the harrowing skins, well i think you will release all the harrowing skins for a limited time like last year at least. and please don't disappoint your buyers with this skin :D and this problem has been posted about in the past on the old forums. 

*TO THE RIOT MEMBER THAT WILL MOST LIKELY REMOVE THIS SINCE IT ALWAYS HAPPENS, PLEASE KNOW THAT THIS IS AN ISSUE AND I FIND IT TO BE A BUG AND I DON'T HAVE THE KNOWLEDGE THAT YOU HAVE TO KNOW THAT IT'S NOT A BUG JUST SAYING!!!* this is just feedback which you guys appreciate and i'm just giving my opinion by the way.

replies.body:
Hey Hydralix, 

This is something that also occurs on the base, and is not something we'll be fixing at this time.

Damn i'v really been wanting to play nocturne with the ghost skin but its so hard to un see no matter what you try, hopefully you guys will fix it in S6 though because I really want to get back into nocturne.

But I mean like pssssh i guess i wont go on for another 3 months not playing nocturne, No no no really its fine its fine.... Just walking down this dark rainy road BY MYSELF without a nocturne all alone :( BUT NO NO NO really it's fine its fine
